meaning_str.bing:
n. 片；〈非正式〉部分；份额；【体】削球
v. 切成片；削球；被切成片；(很容易地)切开
网络. 切片；薄片；剖切

片；〈非正式〉部分；份额；【体】削球
切成片；削球；被切成片；(很容易地)切开

片；一片；薄片；切片；片状物；部分；份额；侧旋球；削球；（斜切打出的）侧曲线球；切片器；切割工具；锅铲；小铲
切；切开；划破；分割；切片；割开；切成薄片；削；大幅度削减；斜切打；打出弧线球；轻松快捷地移动

1.en: But, as it turns out, the company is getting a slice of the action, as these devices run on its servers and use its components.
1.cn: 而该公司正在心想事成，因为这些设备都运行在它的服务器上面并使用它的部件。

2.en: With spectral data from a whole axial slice, we have been able to identify NAA abnormalities in regions remote to any T2 visible lesions.
2.cn: 与光谱数据从一个整体轴向片，我们已经能够确定的NAA异常偏远地区的任何时刻可见病变。

3.en: The 2. 4 scheduler divided time into epochs, and within each epoch, every task was allowed to execute up to its time slice.
3.cn: 调度器将时间分割成epoch，每个epoch中，每个任务允许执行到其时间切片用完。

0.en: I've got here chicken breast. Very thinly slice the chicken.
0.cn: 我这里有些鸡胸肉，将它切成薄片。

1.en: Once rested, slice diagonally and place on the trencher.
1.cn: 肉好了之后，斜着切成片，摆放在面包上。

2.en: Next, slice some spring onions, then we're ready to serve.
2.cn: 接着，切一些葱，然后就可以装盘了。

3.en: This is not personal, it's business. I want a slice of grief pie!
3.cn: 这与交情无关，是在商言商，我想分一块饱含悲痛的馅饼!

4.en: I don't suppose you'd like to come in and have a slice, would you?
4.cn: 我不认为你想进去尝一块的是吧?

5.en: Spread each slice with butter and marmalade. Add a layer of sultanas.
5.cn: 每一片上涂满黄油和果酱，加一层葡萄干。

6.en: OK, Wendy, if you could slice some onions for me, that would be great.
6.cn: 温蒂，麻烦你切一下洋葱。

7.en: Russian companies would oversee production and get a slice of the revenues.
7.cn: 俄国企业会监督生产，获取一小部分收益。

8.en: Some ginger. Just going to slice that. This adds a different element of heat to it.
8.cn: 一些姜，切片，这会加入另一种辣味。

9.en: One peach, half a pineapple, a slice of melon, and something else. What is it? A carrot.
9.cn: 一个桃子，半个菠萝，一片西瓜，和一些其他的东西。是什么呢？一根萝卜。

10.en: Well, it's nice. Yeah. You could just slice through the meat and then onto the other side.
10.cn: 很不错。是的，把肉切开，一直切到底。

11.en: So, what you're going to do is you're going to take your knife, slice him right up the belly.
11.cn: 所以你要做的就是拿起刀，从它的肚皮上切下去。

12.en: First a lovely, crunchy, de-seeded cucumber. We'll slice it like that into sort of half moon, crescent shape.
12.cn: 先准备一根鲜嫩去籽的脆黄瓜，把它们切成半月型，状似新月。

13.en: Here you go. Swiped these from the tech fridge. Oh, nice going. You want a slice? Sure, thanks. Cheers. Cheers.
13.cn: 给你，从技术部冰箱那里偷来的。哦，太棒了。你要来一片吗？好，谢谢。干杯，干杯。

14.en: What we want to do is just slice long thin strips like this. Wrap one Chinese cabbage leaf around each meatball.
14.cn: 我们只需要切开像这样切成细长条，在每个肉丸边放一片大白菜叶。

15.en: Slice up some red and yellow peppers, a tablespoon of grated ginger, some sliced baby corn and shitake mushrooms.
15.cn: 切一些红椒和黄椒，磨碎一汤匙的生姜末，切一些小玉米和香菇。

16.en: He will try a little slice. Mummy Pig gives some cake to Suzy's pretend friend. George is playing with Mr. Dinosaur.
16.cn: 他说他可以先吃一点试试。猪妈妈给苏西的假想朋友切了一块蛋糕。乔治在和恐龙先生玩。

17.en: If you slice the chicken really thinly, then the dish will just cook in a matter of minutes, especially on a high heat.
17.cn: 如果你切得非常薄，那么这道菜几分钟就能烧好，尤其在高温下。

18.en: Luckily, I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake. Stop, Daddy. We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks. Oh.
18.cn: 幸好，我把我的草莓蛋糕紧紧抓在手里。别吃了，爸爸。剩下的蛋糕是要留给鸭子吃的。噢。

19.en: Luckily, I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake. Stop, Daddy. We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks. Oh.
19.cn: 幸好，我把我的草莓蛋糕紧紧抓在手里。别吃了，爸爸。剩下的蛋糕是要留给鸭子吃的。噢。
